title: Ranking QB offseason moves by impact + Robert Kraft growing impatient with the Pats, Eagles express commitment to Jalen Hurts (Football 3/31)
description:
Will Brinson and Tyler Sullivan connect to discuss the latest news out of the NFL and analyze all the QB movement this offseason. First, they focus on New England as Robert Kraft has expressed some displeasure with recent Pats results. What do his comments actually mean? And the Eagles are ready to unveil new uniforms in 2023, will they have a new QB by then as well? Owner Jeffrey Lurie shared that the organization is committed to Jalen Hurts as Brinson and Sully comment on their future at the position. And speaking of QBs, Sully submits his list of the 5 most impactful offseason moves involving quarterbacks. What will top the list: Russell Wilson to the Broncos or Deshaun Watson to the Browns?

(1:30) Patriouts outlook
(21:00) Eagles/Jalen Hurts
(29:00) Lamar Jackson
(35:00) 2022 QB moves

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
